name: vercel-clone
description: A Vercel clone with Next.js frontend, API server, build server, and reverse proxy

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:proxy" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api-server && npm install && cd ../reverse-proxy && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:api" "npm run start:proxy" "npm run start:frontend"
